FRIED NOODLE

Our Website

Ingredients

To make the fried noodle there are 2 main parts you have to prepare.

For the stir-fry:

  • 6 oz egg noodles-dry, fresh, semi-fresh (doesn't matter)
  • 2 tsp cooking oil (divided)
  • 3-4 oz shrimp (any protein)
  • 2 cloves garlic, chopped
  • ½ shallot, chopped
  • 1 oz carrot, julienned
  • 3 oz green leaf vegetable
  • 3 oz beansprouts
  • 1 tbs fried shallot
  • 1 egg

For the sauce:

  • 1 tsp soy sauce
  • 1 tsp dark soy sauce
  • 1 tbs chili paste
  • 1 tbs sweet soy sauce
  • ¼ cup chicken stock

Steps

  1. Mix all the ingredients to make the sauce.
  2. Heat a pan and put an egg and scramble it. Set aside.
  3. Use the same pan, put in the garlic, chicken fillet, prawns, cabbage, beansprouts and green onion. Cook for a while.
  4. After the ingredients are cooked, add your cooked noodle and sauce into the pan, mix it well.
  5. Add the egg into the pan and mix.

Your homemade fried noodle is ready to be served! ^^

For a clearer picture, you can go and visit the original creator! ^^
